scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy streamMusicFile  --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated  --service-account=music-streamer-sa@wireguard-283822.iam.gserviceaccount.com --region=us-central1  --set-env-vars ^@^CORS_ORIGINS=http://localhost:8080,https://storage.googleapis.com && gcloud functions deploy syncGoogleDrive --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated  --service-account=music-streamer-sa@wireguard-283822.iam.gserviceaccount.com --region=us-central1  --set-env-vars ^@^CORS_ORIGINS=http://localhost:8080,https://storage.googleapis.com
